headline: PPL Corporation Announces 2026 Virtual Annual Meeting
summary: PPL Corporation (NYSE:PPL) announced today that the company's 2026 Annual Meeting of Shareowners will be held virtually. The Annual Meeting will convene live via the internet on Wednesday, May 13, 2026, at 9 a.m. Eastern Time.
